name: RooTTT
description:
Classic Tic Tac Toe but on a Rubik's Cube.

RooTTT may be played locally on one computer, or over the Internet.

RooTTT uses the Steam ID of The GoD Unit Demo for online matchmaking, so in order to play over the Internet, you need to add this Demo to your Steam library by pressing Download Demo on the Steam page (free of charge). Once The GoD Unit Demo is in your Steam library, RooTTT will automatically connect to Steam when launched.

Available for Windows and Linux.
